## utils.getBlockTypeCounts() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
>  Blockly.utils.getBlockTypeCounts
> 

Get a map of all the block's descendants mapping their type to the number of children with that type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getBlockTypeCounts(block: Block, opt_stripFollowing?: boolean): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | The block to map. |
|  opt\_stripFollowing | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Optionally ignore all following statements (blocks that are not inside a value or statement input of the block).  Map of types to type counts for descendants of the bock. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
